name: Dys (Meneliki)
description:
You are Zippy the alien! You were vacationing on earth when the forces of chaos invaded and brought about the apocalypse! You need to get to your ship and escape the madness!

This game was created for the Brackey's Game Jam in August of 2021. The theme was "Let There Be Chaos".

CONTROLS: movement - A, D. Jump: Space. 

***DISCLAIMER***: WEBGL(browser) version has been removed - it has far too many issues. Will re-upload if/when I can figure out what's going on with it.
